s: ^Wait! Don't hurt me!

s: ^Younger you?

Branch2_1_30: ^You may not have photos, but you're talking here with me!
^You don't seem like you want anything crazy from me either.
^No restarting the datacenter and using me until I become undrinkable.
^No building a dam to keep me in because I'm dirty and gross.
^No jumping into me or drinking me even though I didn't scare you away.
^Maybe that was a bit too specific, but the point is...
^I'm just glad someone is here for me.
^You know, you would've loved when I used to be a beach.
^You could've been sitting by me all day.
^Instead I have to try and be a monster.
^I don't know, I kinda suck at my job now.

s: ^Is there any way I can help you get back to your normal self?
^I'm sure there's a way to make you scarier.
^What are you talking about? You're doing a great job being a scary monster!
